root.name: Princess Arthur
root.description: OverviewPrincess Arthur is an otome visual novel from Idea Factory that will be release in Japan on March 28th, 2013. The game adapts the Arthurian legend by making King Arthur a girl, Alu, who becomes queen after pulling the sword from the stone. Over the course of the story, the Knights of the Round Table such as Lancelot and Galahad serve as potential suitors.

similar_games.game: Hakuoki: Demon of the Fleeting Blossom
